name: GNOG
description: GNOG is a tactile 3D puzzle game about exploring whimsical monster heads and the secret worlds inside them. Filled with eye-catching designs, lively interactions, and a rich, reactive soundtrack, the hand-crafted heads come to life as you grab, poke, spin, pull, and play with each charming contraption.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 or later Процессор: 2GHz 64-Bit CPU Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 2 GB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 10 or later Процессор: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or higher Место на диске: 2 GB Дополнительно: Recommended Requirements for VR support
